name: Rikudo: Ultimate Ougi
description:
Tailed beasts are attacking the ninja world! Build your team to defend the peace of the ninja world.

※Classic and hot-blooded battles reappear※

Gorgeous ninja skills reappear and bring back your memories

※Build your own ninja team※

100+ ninjas are waiting to join your team. Hire the legendary ninja to win the game.

※Multiple gameplays and unique upgrading system※

There are a lot of fun gameplays here, And you can easily to breakthrough your ninja

※Idle RPG※

Free your hand, and spend your precious time thinking about strategies

※players from all over the world※

Create or join a clan, and fight with players worldwide.
